description: Claude Vibe Flow verification hooks - enforces quality checks and validation loops

hooks.prompt: Code was just modified. You MUST run `lsp_diagnostics` on the changed file to catch type errors and lint warnings immediately. This is non-negotiable - errors accumulate and become harder to fix later.

VERIFICATION CHECKPOINT - Before completing, confirm:
1. TODO: If todowrite was used, run todoread - all items must be completed or explicitly cancelled
2. DIAGNOSTICS: If code was modified, lsp_diagnostics must show 0 errors on all changed files
3. TESTS: If implementation task with existing tests, tests must have been executed

If ANY check fails, block completion and specify the exact next action needed.
